name: Terminal Arena Shooter
description:
Made this for the Linux Game Jam 2017!

It's a purely terminal based game, because what is says "Linux" more than a terminal window? It simulates a twin stick shooter in the terminal window.

The game is written using termloop (https://github.com/JoelOtter/termloop) in the Go programming language.

Source code available at: https://github.com/atolVerderben/TerminalShooter

This project is currently a work in progress and will hopefully get some nice new features down the line!

I have left the original game jam submissions that only have a single control scheme.
